description.name: aedttrc20
description.tagline: AEDT trc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto trc20-aedt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept AEDT trc20 directly on your website
Unique trc20/aedt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your trc20/aedt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
